I bought these chokers a long while ago, so here's my honest review of them! I ordered the all-black, 12-piece. I've had no issues with the quality and was surprised by how stretchy they were when I received them. They fit snugly around my neck area and cause no discomfort at all. I've not had a pair break/snap, suffer wear or tear, or be stuck in an oddly conformed shape. None of them had any issues with the pattern design either. The only struggle is stopping my cat from using them as a toy. Overall, these are nice chokers for the price.
